name: After Human Era
description:
AHE


After Human Era, known also as A.H.E is a game that takes place in a future based environment after humans extinction. The game starts in an elderly mans mansion, nobody is home. You find some notes and recordings telling you to find his device in order to save humans. Upon using the device you get warped through time into the future where you have to figure out what happened to humans. You are forced to journey through a new world, ruled by robots living in harsh conditions.

.

.

.

Discord -----

The discord has a growing community of people ready for my game to release! We put out tons of pictures of progress and changes as soon as it happens on here.

https://discord.gg/bwpAr8Bmec

----------------

Old Mans Device

You find this time travel device in the game. To interact with it press "e" when nearby
